title: My Client is Going Haywire.
body:
So, ive been having this problem for quite some time now, but as it doesnt really affect me playing matches, i tried ignoring it.
But being unable to access the Store to buy rune/champs is pretty annoying.
Although i found an alternate way to buy champs,  i cant really buy any runes which is starting to become annoying.
Also the security alert popups are fairly annoying, they appear anytime i try to open to store.
Like i said, ive been trying to {{champion:106}} with it but now i want to get this fixed.
Another thing. on my main, and quite a few times, my client crashes in the middle of the match....idk if it has anything to do with it.

Oh yeah, and there there is this : http://postimg.org/image/smrdp5b3h/

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try running through [this support article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202536660-Issues-with-the-League-of-Legends-Store-PvP-Net-) for me?

Also, do you currently run an antivirus? If you do, please run a full system scan.
